metadata.title: CVE-2022-0334 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle in versions 3.11 to 3.11.4, 3.10 to 3.10.8, 3.9to 3.9.11 and earlier unsupported versions. Insufficient capability checkscould lead to users accessing their grade report for courses where they didnot have the required gradereport/user:view capability.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
